title: Biden to nominate Ketanji Brown Jackson to Supreme Court, naming a Black woman to high court for first time
description: Biden first pledged to name a Black woman to the nation's highest court just before the 2020 presidential primary in South Carolina.
content: WASHINGTON – President Joe Biden will name Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court, replacing retiring Associate Justice Stephen Breyer with a jurist who would become the first Black woman t… [+5961 chars]
